words.phonetic: tə ɡɛt stʌk ɪn slæʃ ɪntʊ
words.defineEn: to not be able to move from a place or position
words.defineVi: để không thể di chuyển từ một nơi hoặc vị trí

examples: Every day about noon, traffic in town grinds to a halt.
to control the traffic congestion
You can hear the traffic from your room day and night.
Priority is given to traffic already on the roundabout.
The new traffic system worked up to a point, but it had its problems.
words.defineEn: the coming and going of cars, airplanes, etc. in an area at a particular time
words.defineVi: sự đến và đi của ô tô, máy bay, v.v. trong một khu vực vào một thời điểm cụ thể

examples: Alan's explanation just muddies the issue!
Your explanation is too complicated!
The explanation went completely over my head.
His explanation is totally full of prunes and doesn't answer the question at all.
The government's explanation for the budget deficit had more holes than Swiss cheese, and many citizens were left feeling skeptical.
words.defineEn: information or details that are given to make something clear or easier to understand
words.defineVi: thông tin hoặc chi tiết được đưa ra để làm cho một cái gì đó rõ ràng hoặc dễ hiểu hơn

examples: Spring came late this year.
Her latest novel takes the lid off the international art world.
The government's latest proposals are a dog's dinner.
She was only five minutes late!
The latest smartphone is now on the market.
words.defineEn: doing or happening not at the time that is usual or expected, but after it
words.defineVi: làm hoặc xảy ra không phải vào thời điểm thông thường hoặc dự kiến, nhưng sau đó

examples: With atypical depression, you oversleep.

Depressed mood most of the day, diminished interests like we've talked about before in the 'Six Signs of Depression' anhedonia, not being interested in pleasurable activities or activities that used to be pleasurable to you are no longer pleasurable, you may lose weight, you may gain weight, you may oversleep, you may not sleep enough, you may feel fatigued and have body aches.
words.defineEn: to wake up later than one intended to
words.defineVi: thức dậy muộn hơn dự định

examples: He never missed a televised basketball or football game.
I missed the part where that's my problem.
but we missed them.
She received a missed call from an unknown phone number.
You've missed your mark three times in a row.
words.defineEn: to fail to catch a bus, airplane, etc.
words.defineVi: không bắt được xe buýt, máy bay, v.v.

examples: Buses take priority over other vehicles on the road.
The bus hit the bridge.
The bus can take 60 passengers.
Buses to Oxford run every half hour.
A bus appeared around the corner.
words.defineEn: a large vehicle that carries many passengers by road
words.defineVi: một chiếc xe lớn chở nhiều hành khách bằng đường bộ

examples: 95 per cent of the UK can now get superfast broadband.
This room gets very little sunshine.
Get a load of that dress Mag!
Get a load of George over there.
The police got wind of the illegal drug deal.
words.defineEn: to receive or come to have something
words.defineVi: để nhận hoặc đến để có một cái gì đó

examples: The taxi station is just a short walk from my apartment.
I took a taxi from my house to the train station.
The taxi driver helped me with my luggage.
The taxi dropped me off at the entrance of the restaurant.
The taxi driver drove us to the airport quickly and safely.
words.defineEn: a car that has a driver who gets paid for taking people to places
words.defineVi: một chiếc xe có tài xế được trả tiền để đưa mọi người đến những nơi

examples: Find a hobby.
After all, love will find a way.
Water will always find its own level.
She found a dirty stain on her favorite shirt.
The court found in her favor.
words.defineEn: to randomly discover someone or something, particularly in a way that is surprising or unexpected
words.defineVi: để khám phá ngẫu nhiên một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó, đặc biệt là trong một cách đó là đáng ngạc nhiên hoặc bất ngờ

words.defineEn: an area designed so that people could leave their cars or other vehicles there for a period of time
words.defineVi: một khu vực được thiết kế để mọi người có thể để xe của họ hoặc các phương tiện khác ở đó trong một khoảng thời gian
